WHAT ARE BRIAN'S FAVORITE ANIMES?
First favorite anime: Attack on Titan
Second favorite anime: Steins;Gate
Third favorite anime: Violet Evergarden
Link to watch online: clickhere

Synopsis: Eren Yeager lives in a society isolated from the rest of the world via three walls. The society believes that they are the last population of humans left, thinking that there remains no one else outside of the walls. Eren dreams of whatever lies outside of the walls, and yearns to see it for himself. However, a devastating event shatters his perception of his world and his own desires.

Link to watch online: clickhere

Synopsis: Okabe Rintarou lives in an Akihabara apartment with his friends, dubbed the "future gadget laboratory". One particular device, is a microwave that seemingly only turns objects put into it to green goo. Until the group discovers that the microwave holds another secret: it can manipulate time.

Link to watch online: clickhere

Synopsis: The war has ended, and now former child soldier Violet Evergarden struggles to adjust to her new city life. However, a sudden request for her to become an "auto-memories doll" - a person who writes letters for others - comes up. Violet quickly takes it in order to learn the meaning of the "certain words" that her major last said to her.
